name: Bug Splat
overview: Despite its name, Bug Splat is not an action based game, rather it's a dice based gambling/board game in which you have to build a bug by rolling the dice. The game was coded entirely in BASIC and developed by Cout Games. It was released into the public domain on October 1, 2017. The game is actually an unofficial conversion of an old VIC-20 type-in game from 1982.
